name: Word Bakery
description:
Make words by connecting alphabets.
Find all the words you can connect and make.

[How to play]
- Drag the given alphabet to connect.
- The stage is completed when all the given spaces are filled.
- Use hints when you are in trouble. It is also helpful to mix words.
- Collect the words. Extra words, event words, common words to collect rewards
You can receive.
- You can earn coins by matching the puzzles that contain stars.

[Game Features]
- Daily gift every day
- A fun game with simple and easy rules
- Various levels are offered free of charge
- can play even without internet!
- can play even in AIRPLANE mode!
- supports tablet screen
- Supports 14 languages
